With See The Light, The Hours have repeated the magic of their acclaimed 2007 debut, Narcissus Road. Only this time, with the help of legendary producer Flood and a full band, and aided by the art, inspiration and (to be frank) dosh of old pal Damien Hirst, The Hours have created a bigger, bolder, better record.
